textTemplates.description: Items for the Client Success Agent to check
textTemplates.name: PostAdvisoryToDoList
textTemplates.text:
Check client's profile and read the Advisor's Notes. Notes should include: -What was completed by Advisor and if they addressed client's questions -What needs to be completed by the client before next call -VTO has been completed -EIN paperwork has been submitted -Ensure second Advisory call scheduled with client in the next 14-21 days
If note content is insufficient, reach out to the Advisor's manager and request an update or revision to notes
